projects.name: Agrume
projects.baseline: API development made for front-end developers.
projects.description: Front-end developers are often afraid of the backend. They don't know how to start, what to do, and how to do it. Agrume is a tool that makes developing API endpoints as easy as writing a function. Best of all, it's type-safe!  I built this tool to help my teams at school to develop our prototypes faster by making it easier to use a feature-based structure.

projects.name: Diabolo
projects.baseline: Simple, cross-platform, no external dependencies, and type-safe dependency injection library.
projects.description: I was missing a library to inject dependencies in my projects running on different platforms (Node.js, browser, React Native).  I wanted a library that was very straightforward to use but didn't find any that met my needs.  The closest I found was Effect, but it was too complex for my use case.  So I decided to create my own tool.

projects.name: Karmine Plus
projects.baseline: An application to track the results, the next games, the leaderboards, and the players of Karmine Corp.
projects.description: Karmine Plus is an unofficial application that allows you to follow the results, the next games, the leaderboards, and the players of Karmine Corp.  I built this application with my friends.  We wanted to be able to have a centralized place to get all the information about Karmine Corp.
